remarks: The edges of a graph, shown as operation value.  Although a little less intuitive, this representation is often used because it is shorter than the representation as function value of a graph given as ordered pair, see ~ edgopval .  The representation ` ran E ` for the set of edges is even shorter, though.  (Contributed by AV, 2-Jan-2020.)
statement: edgov $p |- ( ( V e. W /\ E e. X ) -> ( V Edges E ) = ran E ) $.
